extension.summary: Livestreamer extracts streams from various services
extension.description: Livestreamer is a command-line utility that pipes video streams from various services into a video player, such as VLC. The main purpose of Livestreamer is to allow the user to avoid buggy and CPU heavy flash plugins but still be able to enjoy various streamed content. There is also an API available for developers who want access to the video stream data.
extension.license: Simplified BSD

extension.summary: Surveillance Room is a full featured IP Camera viewer for up to 6 IP Cameras. This add-on also supports Foscam IP Cameras APIs.
extension.description: Originally designed for Foscam HD IP cameras, this addon can now live stream and monitor motion and sound alarms for up to 6 IP Cameras. The add-on can show the video feed for up to 4 IP Cameras simultaneously, or 6 cameras individaully. Motion or sound alarms for Foscam IP Cameras can be made to trigger a preview of the camera, or the preview windows can be called by a button, script or externally.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is not affiliated with Foscam. This add-on will modify some settings on the camera itself such as motion and sound detection settings.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: A context menu item that works with Surveillance Room - a full featured IP Camera viewer for up to 6 IP Cameras.
extension.description: Choose from the settings how this will work, and play the camera in the view you want!
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is not affiliated with Foscam. This add-on will modify some settings on the camera itself such as motion and sound detection settings.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
